website_summaries.verdict: Great value with nice accessories, but still mid-range quality.
pros: Made out of high-quality materials, including spruce top and rosewood fingerboard
Includes a padded bag, strap, three picks, a pick guard, and a hex key (to adjust the string action)
Great kit for a serious beginner
Nice sound for the price and size
cons: Not quite professional construction, so it may lack some durability over time

customer_reviews.title: Great value 36" 3/4 with metal strings with warm but clear sound. Great student guitar!
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for my nine year old just starting guitar lessons and both the instructor and I were impressed with the out-of-the-box performance, tone and clarity we got from this guitar. Ours required just a little tweak to the tuning to be right on and the instructor was very happy with the warm but clear tones expressed by this acoustic guitar. The fit and finish of the guitar was also fantastic for the price and ours came nicely tooled, tight and well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: J. B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: These Hola instruments are an excellent value for the money. Our first experience with them was a concert ukulele which is exceptionally beautiful and well made. This guitar features the same fine construction and has surprisingly good tone. Bought the HG-36N natural satin finish steel string version for my 8 year old son to start learning. Ideal size for him. It's not an expensive high-end guitar but certainly no toy, either. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: good beginner guitar
customer_reviews.text: I had never heard of Hola guitars so I was skeptical. This guitar is a very good value for a beginner's guitar. I own and have played many different acoustic guitars, in all different price ranges. It's amazing that an instrument of this quality can be had for less than $100. The guitar plays well and sounds decent. It is small, so don't expect a big sound. Would be excellent for young beginners.
customer_reviews.author: J. Puentes

customer_reviews.title: Great first guitar.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this guitar as my beginner guitar. Great size for small hands, and it sounds pretty good. I had a chance to play a similar sized high end guitar. I could tell the sound was better on the high end guitar, but not so much of a difference that it made me dislike this one! I highly recommend this guitar for beginners or for use as a small travel guitar.
customer_reviews.author: brie0017

customer_reviews.title: Plans
customer_reviews.text: My son got this guitar for his first beginner guitar awhile back. I could not pass the guitar on to his brother because he won't give it up, he said he didn't want to move in to a full size guitar, he liked this size. So, I ordered a second guitar for his younger brother from this company, different color. Both boys really like this guitar. I appreciate the fact that it is made sturdy to last. I am completely satisfied and pleased with both purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Momofboys

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic service and excellent deal!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely impressed with this product especially considering the price for a great guitar for my grandchildren to learn with. The guitar is good quality for its intended purpose. I would recommend this for anyone who wants to learn to play guitar. Its size is great for younger as well as adults. A great travel instrument for the occasional player to enjoy as well as students. Exceptional service from a company whose goal is to make sure the customer is totally satisfied. "Impressive"
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size and has an excellent sound. The guitar was very well packaged for ...
customer_reviews.text: Just the guitar my wife was looking for. Just the right size and has an excellent sound. The guitar was very well packaged for shipment and arrived with all of the promised pieces and parts. The carrying case is excellent and she will be able to take the guitar with her while she travels. Thanks for a wonderful product. The was a definite FIVE STAR PURCHASE.
customer_reviews.author: J.D.

customer_reviews.title: Hola! Music Guitars Are Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I just received my Hola! Music Guitar and it is so beautiful. I'm a beginner and I don't know anything about guitars but one can see the gorgeous workmanship put into this instrument. For the price, you will buy a beautiful guitar to treasure. The customer service is awesome, they follow-up right away to check-in and make sure you're happy. Who does that? My son is considering taking up the guitar and wants an Hola! Music guitar if he decides he can fit it in between his college courses and other activities. I can't wait to buy another!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised!!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this guitar!! I bought it for my daughter. It is exactly as pictured. Fit and finish are excellent. Sound is great for what it is. Chords very easily. I would highly recommend this guitar to anyone starting out or even been playing awhile!! Thank you for a great product at a great price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an inexpensive first guitar for my 8 year-old daughter and was surprised at the quality of the guitar. It was well packaged and looks fantastic. Much higher quality look and feel than I expected. It tuned nicely and has a rich sound for a 3/4. The fingerboard is just the right size and feel for my daughter’s smaller hands but I could play it myself. The response from the seller was immediate asking if it arrived and if I had any issues. Excellent service, excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Bradle y Perrin

customer_reviews.title: Great quality  and great price!
customer_reviews.text: The strings were good quality. The whole guitar was made well. I had it sent to a musician for new strings and all and he didn't have to put new ones one. He had to file something down but other than that it was perfect. Great starter guitar for my 9 year old and great price!
customer_reviews.author: Becky A

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sound and perfect size
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd of this model that I have purchased. The first ended up getting signed by her favorite band and that one is going up in a display case so she needed another to actually play. She is a beginner and is 11 so the size is perfect for her, but I actually like the size for myself. The sound of the guitar is beautiful. It stays in tune well, and is a very well made item. We are very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CardsFan

customer_reviews.title: Best quality, best price!
customer_reviews.text: This was my second guitar purchase from Hola! I was so extremely pleased with the first guitar, I bought another! My granddaughters are playing and one is writing her own song already. The guitars are real, high quality instruments. These are not toys! The kit is complete with picks, case, everything you need to begin playing. They are beautiful and have a great sound. For the cost I am very happy with the product and highly recommend Hola guitars!
customer_reviews.author: karen bloom

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful guitar
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful guitar. I couldn’t be more pleased with its craftsmanship. It came with so many extras and was reasonably priced too. I bought if for my teen daughter who wanted to try learning to play. It’s the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: julz152

customer_reviews.title: Very good guitar
customer_reviews.text: Our first experience with them was a concert ukulele which is exceptionally beautiful and well made. This guitar features the same fine construction and has a surprisingly good tone. Bought the HG-36N natural satin finish steel-string version for my 12-year-old son to start learning. Ideal size for him. It's not an expensive high-end guitar but certainly no toy, either. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Pankaj Patel

customer_reviews.title: Great Price, great performance
customer_reviews.text: Guitar is perfect. My daughter is a beginner and recently began taking lessons. Quality is excellent for the price. Customer service is awesome as well. They followed up more than once and answered additional questions which were about outside resource to help with her learning experience. Thumbs way up!
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Solomon

customer_reviews.title: High quality sound & beautiful craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful guitar. Strings lay on frets perfectly and has a very good sound. Excellent product and the very reasonable price and accessories included makes it an excellent value. Highly recommenda.
customer_reviews.author: Aleta W

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, great sounding guitar!!
customer_reviews.text: Most small scale guitars I have tried do not stay in tune. After doing a lot of research, I chose this HOLA. Never heard of it before. I love it. It's a beautiful guitar. Better than pictured. Very happy with this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: sunbum13

customer_reviews.title: 10 year-old daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: This 3/4 size guitar is perfect for my 10 year-old daughter. The guitar stays in tune, has a removable pick guard, and the case has two straps so it can be worn like a back pack. We are very happy with the guitar and the customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Happywife&mom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect guitar for our granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: After a good bit of research, we bought this guitar for our 7 year old granddaughter. We were very pleased with the quality of workmanship when it arrived and she absolutely loves it! She is tall for her age with long fingers and it fits her nicely, with room to grow.
customer_reviews.author: PJeffcoat

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality for the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this guitar for my 10 year old. Mine was too large. This is the perfect size and looks really nice. Strings are high quality and the sound is smooth. Picks included have fun colors and work well. Not disappointed with this guitar. Can't wait to sign up for the free lessons.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and inexpensive guitar for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent guitar for a great value. Highly recommend. Fits my 7 year old perfectly and has such a nice feel. The sound is wonderful. Beautiful natural appearance. Shipped on time. He loves it and has not put it down since receiving it!
customer_reviews.author: abby gampp

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This turned out to be exactly what I was looking for. Perfect size. I was pleasantly surprised by the quality! It really is a great "small" guitar. Perfect for carrying with me as I learn to play. I can leave my $400 guitar at home. The packaging was also great. The guitar arrived in good shape. I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ricci Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great Guitar
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this guitar for my 9 year old granddaughter. She is starting is starting guitar lessons for the 1st time. I wanted her to start off with a quality product. This product did not disappoint. Her guitar instructor concurred. So. I was thrilled and it was shipped expeditiously. Thank you so much. I am so thrilled!!! Belita Butler
customer_reviews.author: Belita D. Butler

customer_reviews.title: Way more than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: This arrived today and I got to tell you it's an absolute beauty! Out of the box just a quick tuning and was ringing like a bell. I bought this for my 5 year old to start learning on. I didn't want a toy and a lot of the bigger names in this size are way overpriced or not really living up to their name as far as quality goes. This is a well made instrument and will last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little gutair.
customer_reviews.text: Great little gutair. I bought it to carry in my work truck so i can practice on my breaks. Only thing that keeps my review from being a 5 star, is that the action is high. Which I did fix by filing down the bridge. Other that that, Its a great gutair.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: perfect cheap beat around guitar.
customer_reviews.text: Great guitar for the price. opened the box. tuned it up, started playing. action was great, tuned up well. using it as a travel/beat around/throw away guitar. very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: twill3

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful guitar. Well made and packaged extremely well. My son was ecstatic! I’m very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: A perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: We received our guitar as a present for our 10 year old son! The guitar is beautiful! It is packaged so nicely and you can tell a lot of care and thought went into this guitar. The quality is perfect and we can’t wait for our son to start playing! We have already received an email regarding the guitar and satisfaction. We would highly recommend this company and product.
customer_reviews.author: alexa grace

customer_reviews.title: Great guitar for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: Well made guitar, nice wood work, and has good tone. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J Cook

customer_reviews.title: It is a great guitar
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect for my granddaughter who is 6. The tone beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Patty D.

customer_reviews.title: Great all around little guitar for the price👍👍
customer_reviews.text: Great little guitar. Nice fit and finish, tone is good and action is easy to play. I bought this guitar for my grand daughter to start with and I’m sure it will get passed on to her younger siblings. If you’re looking for a starter guitar or a guitar to travel with say camping or just writing songs on the couch...I think it’s a winner 👍👍 Good job Hola.
customer_reviews.author: Brian M.

customer_reviews.title: As a music teacher I am very pleased with this guitar!
customer_reviews.text: I just received the Acoustic Guitar Bundle Junior (Travel) Series by Hola by UPS. I was a littler Leary of purchasing a guitar through Amazon without seeing it. But it arrived in great shape and I love the quality for such a great price! I give this a five star and I know my students will love it! I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jodie

customer_reviews.title: very happy with guitar
customer_reviews.text: very happy with guitar. santa gave it to our 10 year old for christmas. he loves it and my older children who are musicians tell me it is an excellent guitar. very handsome ascetically as well!
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item to introduce the guitar to my 8 y.o. kid. He love it. It fits very good and I can also enjoy play it altough being 36". Very decent sound with Daddario strings.
customer_reviews.author: Stefano

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for my teen
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my 13 year old for Christmas and it’s perfect! Size and sound are great and she was able to tune it very easily.

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality and sound!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 9 yr old who is learning to play guitar. A family friend who plays guitar said the quality of the guitar and the sound is very good for the price we paid. So far we have been very happy with the purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Well made, sounds great.
customer_reviews.text: A well made guitar. Perfect size for my daughter. Was easy to tune and sound great.

customer_reviews.title: Beginner Guitar
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this guitar about 2 weeks ago and it has been great! The customer service has been excellent. It arrived quickly and the packaging was good. I highly recommend if you are looking for a beginner guitar!

customer_reviews.title: Best Beginner Bundle
customer_reviews.text: A great bundle. The guitar sounds nice and is very playable. The accessaries are of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mutee

customer_reviews.title: Really a very nice guitar. The fit and finish are excellent
customer_reviews.text: Really a very nice guitar. The fit and finish are excellent, the intonation is perfect, and the action was good right out of the box. An exceptional value.
customer_reviews.author: WK2

customer_reviews.title: Great birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson and he just loves it. The guitar is great and the case is just what he needs.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria slomk

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Gift for our grandson. It looks nice & hopefully he will learn to play!

customer_reviews.title: My son loves the guitar!
customer_reviews.text: Great acoustic guitar. The sound is amazing. My son likes it even though the size 3/4 is a little big for him. I would love if Hola offers the 1/2 size one. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Anh Tran

customer_reviews.title: Her instructor recommended this one and she loves it
customer_reviews.text: Daughter has been taking guitar lessons on a hand-me-down for almost a year. Her instructor recommended this one and she loves it.

customer_reviews.title: Christmas present for my granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present for my granddaughter I hope she learns to play it

customer_reviews.title: Was worried about quality but teacher said how nice it is.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 9 year old to learn on. At his first lesson the teacher complimented on how nice this guitar was. Pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: James Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Total and Complete Love Love Love
customer_reviews.text: Total n complete Love Love Love; so far anyway. Its a gorgeous guitar number one. Its not light either/ has some real solid weight to it. The finish is natural n beautiful. The strings sound crisp n bright. I have only played for a short time so far, will play longer on my day off. But at this point, I am highly impressed w/ this guitar. It's pretty darn GREAT, and the price was so low too. I got the 36 inch size, and I'm 5'5. The size is good n comfortable, not too bulky, and it's certainly loud enuff too. This guitar is really something special. so beautiful. Very happy and thankful to have it.
customer_reviews.author: Andreya

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My son said it’s the best gift he ever got!

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful guitar, worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the $$! Perfect starter guitar for our grandson who is 8!

customer_reviews.title: sounds so crisp..
customer_reviews.text: This guitar is for my 11 yr.old son..He loves it and sounds so crisp...you get more for the value.Excellent ..meet all my expectations..

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our 12yr old
customer_reviews.text: Loved this guitar. Perfect size for our petite 12 yr old. Sounds great and we were impressed with the high quality.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality at any price level
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality. It’s been several months and the guitar plays and sounds great. Would highly recommend.

customer_reviews.text: Received my guitar today and I have to say I will be buying from Hola! Music again. Very good quality and just what I wanted for a travel guitar. Buy It. Worth It !!!!!!!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Great guitar
customer_reviews.text: This guitar sounds great, it is small enough to travel with and well worth it's price

customer_reviews.title: great guitar
customer_reviews.text: great size for a second guitar, sounds really good and feels really nice.. highly recommended

customer_reviews.title: A real guitar for a junior! Awsome set!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this guitar to my granddaughter for Christmas and she loves it. Hasn't hardly put it down sense. Nice soft case, with a strap and picks. Supper happy with the product, great service and follow up from the seller. A+ all the way around!

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: Great product for my 7 year old grandson! He loved it and the size was good for him and should last a long time

customer_reviews.title: It appears to be the perfect size for a beginners guitar
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this guitar for our 9 year old grandson for Christmas. It appears to be the perfect size for a beginners guitar. Amazing quality & fast shipping!!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound!
customer_reviews.text: Going to get the full size for myself this is such a nice guitar for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Rev Alex Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Well made!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful guitar and perfect for travel or for anyone wanting a smaller sized guitar. I am 5'4 and never felt comfortable with full size acoustics and I wanted to get back to playing guitar again. It's been some years but I am loving the size of this guitar. It looks very well made with quality materials for this price. If I had to suggest one or purchase another one I would definitely get this one again. It comes prestrung, all you have to do is tune it (and there are some great tuning aps you can get on your phone) and start playing. This is great for adults or children of any ages.
customer_reviews.author: NaturallyMama

customer_reviews.title: Nice small guitar for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice small guitar for a beginner or a small adult. Nice sound and quality and delivered with a case and strap which was very appreciated. Thank you.

customer_reviews.title: Cool, but broken
customer_reviews.text: This was delivered to us with a huge crack in the shaft. Very disappointing to give as a gift on Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: you will be disappointed. the icon photos that come up on the ...
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't come with all the accessories shown on the page. If you are a speed shopper, as most people are that have Amazon Prime, you will be disappointed. the icon photos that come up on the lefthand side when you click this product, show a guitar case, stands, and picks. Unless you read the fine print, you won't know that those are "also products offered by Hola" rather than products that come with the guitar you purchased! It is a cheap trick and I was sorely disappointed to find out that my guitar arrived sans accessories.
customer_reviews.author: matthias janke

product_meta.title: 3/4 Size (36 Inch) Acoustic Guitar Bundle Junior/Travel Series by Hola! Music with Quality EXP16 Steel Strings, Padded Gig Bag, Guitar Strap and Picks, Model HG-36N, Natural Satin Finish
feature_bullets: Don't miss!! We’ve joined with America’s largest lessons company. When you purchase this bundle, you will get TWO MONTHS of FREE live, video lessons where you can interact and learn from an expert instructor. You’ll be on your journey to stardom in no time!
Make sure to watch the Video on the left for full description and specifications.

Hola! Music HG-36N (36 Inch 3/4 Size) features: Spruce top, Mahogany back, sides and neck. Natural warm satin finish. Rosewood fingerboard and bridge with TUSQ nut and compensated TUSQ saddle. Tuners: Geared, die-cast chrome covered. Pre-strung with high quality EXP16 Coated Phosphor Bronze strings - Just tune up to pitch and you're ready to play!
Decoration: Traditional tortoise-shell like pattern celluloid binding on body, neck and soundhole.
Hola! Music guarantees quality and affordability. Hola! - Say Hello to Music!
